thread.title: Are these the worst selfie fails EVER?
thread.title_full: Are these the worst selfie fails EVER?

title: Are these the worst selfie fails EVER?
text: comments For the most part, people take selfies to share a fun moment with friends - or simply show off. Unfortunately for these snappers however, they've missed some extremely odd things going on in the background of the photos that ruin the vibe they were going for but make them far more entertaining. BoredPanda have compiled a selfie gallery featuring these rogue additions - including pooping dogs and sex toys - and they're guaranteed to make you cringe... This woman was keen to show off her outfit with a bathroom selfie but didn't seem to realise her friend was busy in the background The mirror in this woman's photo managed to catch a man eagerly checking out her rear end This unfortunate girl tried to pretend her boyfriend had caught her out by snapping her in the shower, but the reflection gave the game away RELATED ARTICLES
